text: House of Wax is a 1953 American horror thriller movie. It was directed by Andre DeToth. It is a remake of the 1933 movie Mystery of the Wax Museum (1933). Actors include Vincent Price, Frank Lovejoy, Phyllis Kirk, Carolyn Jones, Roy Roberts, and Charles Bronson. It was distributed by Warner Bros. It was remade in 2005 as House of Wax. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950s horror movies Category:1953 thriller movies Category:American horror movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Andre DeToth Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in museums
title: House of Wax
